name: Texas A&M Data Analytics Club
description:
The Texas A&M Data Analytics Club has two primary goals. First, to teach students the basics of technical skills, such as R, Python, SAS, Tableau, to better prepare students for analytics in the business environment. Second, to bring blue chip firms to campus to recruit club members and to provide top analytics talent. See below for a few of the firms that have expressed interest in recruiting club members. 

Companies interested in recruiting club members

  • Amazon
  • BP
  • Capital One
  • Dell
  • Deloitte
  • EY
  • Gartner
  • Grant Thornton
  • Goldman Sachs
  • Humana
  • KPMG
  • Microsoft
  • Pratt & Whitney
  • PwC
  • USAA
  • and more...

Club Activities

  • Technical trainings (R, SAS, Tableau, Machine Learning)
  • On campus corporate information sessions 
  • Summer Internship Bootcamps (resumes, interviews, and networking)
  • Hosts Humana data analytics case competition

Student Leadership 

  • Karuna Kankani - Co-President - Master's in Information Systems
  • Anish Patel - Co-President - Master's in Finance 
  • Nicholas Petty - Vice President of Case Competition - Master's in Business Administration 
  • Gourav Ghoshal - Vice President of Technical Applications - Master's in Operation Research
  • Megan Meyer - Vice President of Trainings - Bachelor's in Statistics
  • Seyi Moronfoye - Co-Vice President of Corporate Relations - Master's in Finance
  • Tyler Dansand - Co-Vice President of Corporate Relations - Bachelor's in Economics
  • Priyanka Shah - Vice President of Marketing - Masters in Finance
  • Won Woo Choi - Treasurer and Secretary - Masters in Finance

Faculty Chairs

  • Dr. Hari Sridhar
  • Dr. Michael Ketzenberg

Full Analytics Report
summary: The mission of the club is to teach students how to combine strategy, computer science and statistics to make better business decisions through tools such as R, SAS and Tableau

contactInfo.street1: Mays Business School, Texas A&M University, College Station
